name: Quiz Game
topics: A quiz game designed to help educate people in the field of wine. This has been built using inquirer, javascript, html, and css

name: Yikes!
topics: This project is group collaboration set to provide a client review app for business to rate their clients. Built with: html, css, javascript, sequelize, MySql and expressJS.

name: Scheduler App
topics: This work is a desktop scheduling app design to help th euser organize their days to be more eficient. Built with html, css, javascript, Moment.js and express.

name: Find My Brewery
topics: This project is group collaboration set to provide an alterantive tool to better search for local breweries. Built with: html, css, javascript, googleAPIs, Open BreweryDB, and jquery.

name: JATE
topics: This is a text editor PWA which provides an easier alternative to other text editor while being able to be installed as a PWA. Built with javascript, node, express, babel and webpack using a service worker.
